alert.note: Alert for Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 7:53PM EST until February 18 at 1:45PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh PA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Tuscarawas River Above New Philadelphia affecting Tuscarawas County.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz. OHC157-181600- /O.NEW.KPBZ.FL.W.0011.220218T0115Z-220218T1845Z/ /NWPO1.1.ER.220218T0235Z.220218T0600Z.220218T1245Z.UU/ 753 PM EST Thu Feb 17 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscarawas River above New Philadelphia. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, Water reaches outbuilding of one mobile home on Pine Lane. At 8.0 feet, Water begins to affect several mobile homes along Pine Lane. The ballfields at Waterworks Field Recreation Area are flooded. Water overspreades parking lot of Smith`s Dairy at the end of Cookson Avenue. At 8.5 feet, The intersection of Front Avenue and Bluebell Road is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 8.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 7.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
